short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop on Amazon, get points for your purchases and redeem them to win gift cards!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
💥 Get ready to turn those Amazon buys into sweet rewards! Introducing the Amz Points plugin – your secret weapon for scoring FREE Amazon Gift Cards!  🎁

Here's how it works:

𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗽𝗹𝘂𝗴𝗶𝗻: A quick and easy setup gets you started.
𝗦𝗵𝗼𝗽 𝗼𝗻 𝗔𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗼𝗻 𝗮𝘀 𝘂𝘀𝘂𝗮𝗹: The plugin works automatically in the background.
𝗘𝗮𝗿𝗻 𝗽𝗼𝗶𝗻𝘁𝘀 𝗲𝗳𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗹𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗹𝘆:  Your purchases translate into rewards points.
𝗥𝗲𝗱𝗲𝗲𝗺 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗴𝗶𝗳𝘁 𝗰𝗮𝗿𝗱𝘀: Cash in your points for Amazon Gift Cards and treat yourself!

It's seriously that simple. The Amz Points plugin is your ticket to effortless rewards on Amazon.  What are you waiting for? 😉
